title: SQL UPDATE & DELETE
subject: Database Management Systems
theory:
**UPDATE**: Modifies existing records.
**DELETE**: Removes records.
CRITICAL: Always use WHERE, or you affect the whole table.
syntax: UPDATE Users SET Age=20 WHERE ID=5;

examples.code:
DELETE FROM Users; -- Deletes ALL users
DELETE FROM Users WHERE ID=1; -- Deletes One.

common_mistakes.correction: UPDATE Employee SET Salary = 1000; sets EVERYONE's salary. Disaster.
